snippet: Marty Turco, who spent a year out of the N.H.L., made 19 saves in his second victory since he joined Boston this month.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Boston Bruins defeat New York Islanders, 6-3, eliminating them from playoff contention; New Jersey Devils clinch a playoff berth; other NHL results noted.
lead_paragraph: Marty Turco, who spent a year out of the N.H.L., made 19 saves in his second victory since he joined Boston this month.

headline.seo: Bruins Eliminate Islanders From Playoff Contention
headline.main: Bruins Eliminate Islanders; Devils Clinch a Playoff Berth
headline.print_headline: Bruins Eliminate Islanders; Devils Clinch a Playoff Berth
